content: * to last 6 stitches k1 yo k1 p2 k2 rounds 2-8 knit as established knit the knit stitches and purl the purl stitches note you will knit the yo from earlier round round 9 *p2 k1 ds k1 p2 k1 yo k1* repeat * to * until end of round round 10-16 as round 2 round 17 p2 *k1 yo k1 p2 k1 ds k1 p2* repeat * to * to last 7 stitches k1 yo k1 p2 k1 ds k1 round 18-25 as round 2 round 26 *p2 k1 ds k1 p2 k1 yo k1* repeat * to * until end of round round 27-33 as round 2 repeat rounds 17-33 until buff measures approx 10 or you ve reached your desired length and you re either about to knit a round 17 or 26 a drop stitch round then knit as follows finishing on round 17 p2 *k2 p2 k1 ds k1 p2* repeat * to * to last 7 stitches k2 p2 k1 ds k1 finishing on round 26 *p2 k1 ds k1 p2 k2* repeat * to * until end of round final ribbing p2 k2 in the round for approx 3cm bobble using jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off https //youtu be/53mtbkyf5cq it s important to have a really stretchy bind off as you want your bobble end to be a little wider than the co end as it will sit a bit better around your neck soak in cold water and then block gently into shape ©jacqui verbeek 2020 page �3
